ctFastPathDHCPSnoopingMIB.name: ctFastPathDHCPSnoopingMIB
ctFastPathDHCPSnoopingMIB.contactinfo: Postal: Enterasys Networks 50 Minuteman Rd. Andover, MA 01810-1008 USA Phone: +1 978 684 1000 E-mail: support@enterasys.com WWW: http://www.enterasys.com
ctFastPathDHCPSnoopingMIB.description: The Enterasys MIB for FASTPATH DHCP Snooping

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingAdminMode.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingAdminMode
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingAdminMode.description: This object indicates whether DHCP Snooping is enabled globally. If this object is set to 'true',admin mode is enabled globally. If this object is set to 'false',admin mode is disabled globally.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVerifyMac.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVerifyMac
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVerifyMac.description: This object indicates whether source Mac address in the received DHCP Message needs to be verified or not. If this object is set to 'true',verifyMac is enabled globally. If this object is set to 'false',verifyMac is disabled globally.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigTable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigTable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigTable.description: A table provides the mechanism to control DHCP SNOOPING per VLAN. When a VLAN is created in a device supporting this table, a corresponding entry of this table will be added.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigEntry.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigEntry
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanConfigEntry.description: A row instance contains the configuration for DHCP SNOOPING at each existing VLAN.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanIndex.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanIndex
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanIndex.description: This object indicates the VLAN number on which DHCP SNOOPING Inspection feature is configured.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanEnable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanEnable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingVlanEnable.description: This object indicates whether DHCP SNOOPING is enabled in this VLAN. If this object is set to 'true', DHCP SNOOPING is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', DHCP SNOOPING is disabled.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigTable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigTable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigTable.description: A table provides the mechanism to configure the trust state for DHCP snooping purpose at each physical interface capable of this feature.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigEntry.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigEntry
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfConfigEntry.description: A row instance contains the configuration for DHCP snooping at each physical interface capable of this feature.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfTrustEnable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfTrustEnable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfTrustEnable.description: This object indicates whether the interface is trusted for DHCP snooping purpose.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfLogEnable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfLogEnable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfLogEnable.description: This object indicates whether the Logging needs on DHCP snooping validations or not

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfRateLimit.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfRateLimit
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfRateLimit.description: This object indicates rate limit value for DHCP Snooping purpose. If the incoming rate of DHCP packets exceeds the value of this object for consecutively burst interval seconds, DHCP packets will be dropped.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfBurstInterval.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfBurstInterval
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingIfBurstInterval.description: This object indicates the burst interval value for rate limiting purpose on this interface.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsReset.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsReset
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsReset.description: Clear the DHCP snooping statistics on all ports. A value of reset(1) is used to reset the statistics. A read on this object will always return the value none(0). The value none(0) cannot be forcibly set by the administrator.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsTable.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsTable
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsTable.description: A table provides the mechanism for statics of DHCP snooping.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsEntry.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsEntry
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingStatsEntry.description: A row instance contains the DHCP snooping statistics per VLAN.

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingMacVerifyFailures.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingMacVerifyFailures
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingMacVerifyFailures.description: This object indicates the number of failure verifications of client mac address with source mac address

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidClientMessages.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidClientMessages
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidClientMessages.description: This object indicates the number of invalid DHCP releases and denay messages

ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidServerMessages.name: ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidServerMessages
ctAgentDhcpSnoopingInvalidServerMessages.description: This object indicates the number of invalid DHCP server mesaages

ctAgentStaticDsBindingTable.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingTable
ctAgentStaticDsBindingTable.description: A table of the DHCP SNOOPING static entries

ctAgentStaticDsBinding.name: ctAgentStaticDsBinding
ctAgentStaticDsBinding.description: Represents a binding in DHCP SNOOPING table

ctAgentStaticDsBindingIfIndex.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingIfIndex
ctAgentStaticDsBindingIfIndex.description: Interface on which this DHCP SNOOPING binding is going to be added.

ctAgentStaticDsBindingVlanId.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingVlanId
ctAgentStaticDsBindingVlanId.description: VLAN to whcig this DHCP SNOOPING binding is going to be added.

ctAgentStaticDsBindingMacAddr.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingMacAddr
ctAgentStaticDsBindingMacAddr.description: MAC address match value for the DHCP SNOOPING Binding.

ctAgentStaticDsBindingIpAddr.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingIpAddr
ctAgentStaticDsBindingIpAddr.description: IP address match value for the DHCP SNOOPING Binding.

ctAgentStaticDsBindingRowStatus.name: ctAgentStaticDsBindingRowStatus
ctAgentStaticDsBindingRowStatus.description: The status of this conceptual row. active(1) - this DHCP SNOOPING Binding is active createAndGo(4) - set to this value to create an instance destroy(6) - set to this value to delete an instance

ctAgentDynamicDsBindingTable.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBindingTable
ctAgentDynamicDsBindingTable.description: A table of the DHCP SNOOPING Dynamic entries

ctAgentDynamicDsBinding.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBinding
ctAgentDynamicDsBinding.description: Represents a binding in DHCP SNOOPING table

ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIfIndex.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIfIndex
ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIfIndex.description: Interface on which this DHCP SNOOPING binding is going to be added.

ctAgentDynamicDsBindingVlanId.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBindingVlanId
ctAgentDynamicDsBindingVlanId.description: VLAN to whcig this DHCP SNOOPING binding is going to be added.

ctAgentDynamicDsBindingMacAddr.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBindingMacAddr
ctAgentDynamicDsBindingMacAddr.description: MAC address match value for the DHCP SNOOPING Binding.

ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIpAddr.name: ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIpAddr
ctAgentDynamicDsBindingIpAddr.description: IP address match value for the DHCP SNOOPING Binding.

ctDhcpSnoopingIntfErrorDisabledTrap.name: ctDhcpSnoopingIntfErrorDisabledTrap
ctDhcpSnoopingIntfErrorDisabledTrap.description: Trap is sent once an interface is error disabled by DHCP Snooping when the incoming packet rate exceeded configured rate limit during a burst-interval.
